weareplanet-settings.messageNotBlank: This value should not be blank.

button.description: Click this button to set WeArePlanet as default payment handler in the selected SalesChannel
button.label: Set WeArePlanet as default payment handler

applicationKey.label: Application Key
applicationKey.tooltipText: The Application Key is used to authenticate this plugin with the WeArePlanet API.

spaceId.label: Space ID
spaceId.tooltipText: The space ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the WeArePlanet API.

userId.label: User ID
userId.tooltipText: The user ID is used to authenticate this plugin with the WeArePlanet API.

settingForm.messageOrderDeliveryStateError: WeArePlanet OrderDeliveryState could not be saved.
settingForm.messagePaymentMethodConfigurationError: WeArePlanet PaymentMethodConfiguration could not be saved. Please check your credentials.
settingForm.messageWebHookError: WeArePlanet WebHook could not be saved. Please check your credentials.

emailEnabled.label: Do not send order confirmation email
emailEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will not receive an email from your store when their order payment is authorised

lineItemConsistencyEnabled.label: Line item consistency
lineItemConsistencyEnabled.tooltipText: If this option is enabled line item totals in WeArePlanetPayment will always match Shopware order total

invoiceDownloadEnabled.label: Invoice Download
invoiceDownloadEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled your customers will be able to download order invoices from WeArePlanet

webhooksUpdateEnabled.label: Webhooks Update
webhooksUpdateEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled webhook update will be triggered when you save settings

paymentsUpdateEnabled.label: Payments Update
paymentsUpdateEnabled.tooltipText: If this setting is enabled payment methods update will be triggered when you save settings
